topic.title: Invisible Issue Post on GitHub For ZeroNet Repo
topic.body:
The issues thread itself:
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/306

Side by side comparison of logged in user view and anyone else's view.
https://u.pomf.is/mqzsmw.png

It's been more than an hour since it has been posted, so I doubt it will turn up. It's not to report a technical issue (which is on GitHub's end anyways), but rather to express that there's a post to the issue that not everyone, or anyone at all can see.
